name: Tabletop Arena
description:
You are a soldier figurine and you have come to life. You must battle every other figurine that is in your way. But remember you are only on a coffee table.

Controls: It is "WASD" to move, "Left Click" for your stab attack and "Shift" to dash.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 38 Challenge. It was a tough three days but it was a good three days spent, making a game. Overall, we all had a great experience and had a fun time.

Tools Used: 

  • Unity 5.6 (C#)
  • Piskel
  • Fl Studios
  • BFXR

People Involved: 

  • Tyranosaw (https://twitter.com/Tyranosaw)
  • Zuezazon (https://twitter.com/Zuezazon)
  • Fynzyme (https://soundcloud.com/fynzyme).

Ludum Dare Website: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/tabletop-ar...
